lead_paragraph: Indiana Coach Terry Hoeppner, 59, was scheduled to have surgery today to remove a possible tumor in his head, and his doctor said he could return to the team in two to four weeks. A magnetic resonance imaging test showed evidence of a possible recurrent tumor, Marshall Poor, a neurosurgeon, said yesterday in a statement. In December, surgeons removed a tumor from Hoeppner’s right temple.
